creator: rinzai@excite.com
text:
I am unable to remove the timestamps on Tomcat log files. If I change timestamp to false 
or remove the entry altogether, it continue to timestamp the log files.

Also the docs claim that a date/time is stamped, but only a date is stamped. So 
either this option should be called datestamp, or a time component should be 
stamped to the log files as well.
creator: aart.de.vries@shaw.ca

text: I have just tested this and it works for me.
creator: markt@apache.org
